title: Little J & Big Cuz
brief_description: Little J, he’s five and Big Cuz, she’s nine. They’re a couple of Indigenous Australian kids living with their Nanna and Old Dog.

constellations_primary.name: Little J & Big Cuz to Blade
constellations_primary.description: Discover how some of the best indigenous works connect to comic book blockbusters and martial arts videogames.

constellations_other.name: Learning through play
constellations_other.description: Alexander Stitt and Bruce Weatherheadâ€™s Zoetrope to Cinemascope educated children about the moving image through posters, cut-outs, puzzles and games, but moving image works have also been used to educate and entertain kids about all aspects of life.
